data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Južno-Bački, Serbia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Južno-Bački, Serbia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Južno-Bački, Serbia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 599,200 souls living in the state of Južno-Bački with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Južno-Bački, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Serbian-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 4,302 believers living in Južno-Bački, Serbia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Južno-Bački, Serbia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Južno-Bački, Serbia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.
